ComicInfo.Summary:
There can be only one... only one all-new, action-packed, monthly comic book series starring the Immortal Highlander!
Writers Brandon Jerwa and Michael Avon Oeming continue the "Coldest War" along with artist Lee Moder and Connor and crew continue to face the spawn of the Kurgan in the present, while dealing with the Soviet threat in the past!
Connor and his immortal allies continue their quest to stop the murderous Temnotiye agents from carrying out the deadly legacy of their master in the 1980's! And speaking of the Kurgan - bear witness to the sheer brutality of the deadliest Immortal as Connor faces down his eternal foe in the 1960s! This cross-time caper is escalating beyond the control of everyone involved...but you can be sure of one thing: HEADS WILL ROLL!
